(Act No.35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8) Order, 2024
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government By Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 8)
Order, 2024.
2. A candidate for election as a council chairperson in the Date and
district set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the eet
Returning Officer on Saturday, 19th October, 2024 between 0900 for election
hours and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Monday, 21st Campaign
October, 2024 at 0800 hours and close at 1800 hours on Saturday, Period
26th October, 2024.
4, (1) The poll for the election ofa council chairperson in the Election date
district set out in the Schedule shall take place on Sunday, 27th see of
October, 2024 between 0600 hours and 1800 hours. | DO
(2) Apoll shall not be taken in a district ifonly one candidate
is validly nominated.
